#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
ll t,n,ans;
//int num=1<<;
//cout<<num<<endl;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    cin>>n;
    if(n%2!=0)
        cout<<0<<endl;
    else
    {
            n=n/2;
            cout<<9;

            while(n>1){
            cout<<0;
            n--;
            }
    }
    cout<<endl;
}
    return 0;
}
